mapper.select: SELECT A.seq, A.regDate, A.usageList_seq, A.photo_uciCode AS uciCode, D.`usage`, D.division1, D.division2, D.division3, D.division4, D.price FROM basket A INNER JOIN photo B ON A.photo_uciCode = B.uciCode INNER JOIN member C ON A.member_seq = C.seq INNER JOIN usageList D ON A.usageList_seq = D.seq WHERE A.member_seq = #{member_seq}
